rationales.description: The flux exceptions have exceeded the materiality threshold significantly, indicating potential misstatements in financial reporting.
rationales.recommended_action: Conduct a detailed variance analysis to identify the root cause of the flux exceptions and adjust entries as necessary.

rationales.description: AP exceptions indicate control failures in the accounts payable process, potentially leading to unauthorized or erroneous payments.
rationales.threshold_breached: Control thresholds for AP processing exceeded
rationales.recommended_action: Review and strengthen AP controls, ensuring all payments are authorized and properly documented.

rationales.description: Bank duplicates suggest data quality issues that could impact the accuracy of cash balances reported.
rationales.recommended_action: Perform a reconciliation of bank statements to identify and eliminate duplicate entries.

rationales.description: AR exceptions may lead to non-compliance with revenue recognition standards, affecting financial statement accuracy.
rationales.threshold_breached: Revenue recognition compliance requirements not met
rationales.recommended_action: Review AR entries to ensure compliance with revenue recognition policies and adjust as necessary.
